body.name: Liddle Speaker Magnetic Small Bluetooth Speaker Support MagSafe for iPhone 12/13/14/15, Wall Mountable Mini Bluetooth Speaker for Golf Cart, Magnetic Attach to Anywhere, True Wireless Speaker (Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 😊【Why Choose Us】The D3 Liddle Speaker checks all the boxes of the best magnetic Bluetooth speaker that many consumers need. It is portable, durable, easy to use and offers the ultimate listening experience to its users. Its unique design serves several purposes, while its ability to attach to any surface makes it a versatile speaker. We believe these features make the D3 Liddle Speaker worthy of our Best of CES 2022 award.

😊【Magnetic Wall Mountable】The Liddle Speaker has 9 built-in magnets, which can be attached to any metal surface such as refrigerators. With the Metal ring in the package, this magnetic bluetooth speaker can be installed on any surface such as glass, doors, cabinets, etc. Music anytime, anywhere without taking up any space and easy installation.

😊【Mag-Safe Compatible】Compatible with iPhone 12/13/14/15 mini pro Max, compatible with MagSafe phone case, can be directly attached to the back of the phone as a stand, watch movies, browse TikTok, video chat and play music through the liddle speaker, this compatible MagSafe Speaker can also be used through Metal ring gives the same functionality to other phones.

😊【Play More, Charge Less】Although the size is small, it can play for up to 8 hours and only needs to be charged fully for 1.5 hours, which can meet all your daily needs. As a small and mini Bluetooth speaker, its using experience can fully satisfy you.
😊【True Wireless Pairing】Two Liddle Speakers can be synch together providing a surround sound system with the volume controlled by a user’s Bluetooth phone or computers volume control.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Liddle Speaker is packed with advanced features to make the sound experience one of kind. It comes with our built in MagSafe technology to allow you to attach The Liddle Speaker to any magnetic surface. It comes with our Bluetooth light indicator to let you know when your device is connected.

MagSafe Compatible Liddle speaker is specially designed for iPhone 12/13 MagSafe function, it can be easily attached to your phone as a phone stand. Magnetic Wall Mountable With 9 built-in magnets it can easily attach to any metal surfaces. Music on the Go 2.36 x 2.36 x 1.57 inch size, it can easily fit into backpack, pocket, bag and carry it around with your daily life. Play More and Charge Less Up to 8 hours play time and only need to charge 2 hours. Please fully charge your liddle speaker before using it.
The 2* magnetic rings are used for phone case or some non-metallic surface like wood, glass, plastic, silicone, etc. Put this magnetic ring on it and attach the speaker with magnetic connection.

Will The Liddle Speaker attach to the back of my Iphone? Yes, if you have the Iphone 12 or 13 The Liddle Speaker will attach to the back of your Iphone for added sound for music or podcasts. Can I take my Liddle Speaker to the pool with me? Yes, The Liddle Speaker is IPX-4 Water Resistant. We built this speaker knowing you would want to take it to the pool, beach, and even your shower. If I buy two Liddle Speakers can I pair them together? Yes, with our Bluetooth 5.0 it allows you to pair two of The Liddle Speaker's at once for a premium sound quality. What if I want to attach my Liddle Speaker to something that is not Magnetic? The Liddle Speaker comes with two adhesive metal rings that you can apply to your Liddle Speaker and attach it to any non-magnetic surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT for MagSafe iPhones, adds decent sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I have the iPhone 14 Pro Max and to be honest its built-in sound quality leaves much to be desired, way too much. This innovative Chinese little external speaker attaches to the back of Pro iPhones via MagSafe (two rings with 3M sticky tapes are included for phones without MagSafe) and connects via Bluetooth. The sound quality is not pro-level by any measure but more than adequate for a small, very portable, and VERY convenient stereo speaker. It also doubles as an iPhone stand! Battery life is good, I get about 7-8 hours on each charge (roughly 15 playbacks with 30 minutes each time when I exercise to a fitness app on my phone). I love this little gizmo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like with the magnet attachment works very well quality sound is great all around

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what i was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I was searching for a not too small and not too large speaker that will be convenience taking with me to the pool. I love this speaker - it is small, but have a nice sound and it is magnetic, so just sticking it to my iphone - there are better quality speakers, but also larger.. this is great for the purpose. Love it.
